name: macpro-seatool
description: State Early Alert (SEA) Tool for managing and tracking Medicaid state plan amendments, waivers, and demonstrations through the CMS review and approval process.
longDescription: The State Early Alert (SEA) Tool is a comprehensive web application that enables CMS central office and regional office staff to manage, track, and approve various types of Medicaid state submissions including State Plan Amendments (SPA), 1115 Demonstration Waivers, 1915(b) and 1915(c) Home and Community-Based Services Waivers, CHIP amendments, Advance Planning Documents (APD), Administrative (ADM) forms, and Upper Payment Limit (UPL) forms. Built with ASP.NET MVC and C#, the system provides complex workflow management with status tracking, role-based access control, automated reporting and notifications, comprehensive audit trails, and multi-environment support. The application serves as a critical component of the Medicaid infrastructure, ensuring proper oversight and timely processing of state submissions that impact healthcare coverage for millions of Americans. The system includes sophisticated business rules, validation logic, automated email alerts, extensive reporting capabilities, and user management features that support the complex regulatory requirements of Medicaid program administration.
